name: df-nq
body: |- wceq(cnq, crab(s0, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), wral(s1, cxp(cnpi, cnpi), wi(wbr(cv(s0), ceq, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), clti, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))))))
comment: Define class of positive fractions. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-2.2 of [Gleason] p. 117. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
